thread.title: Gabi

author: Gabi
title: Gabi
text:
I booked my staying in Cuba with Homestay and I recognize the efficiency and the speed of their answers and these of the hosts. However I think that the best decision they took is to give you at anytime the possibility of writing and converse personally with someone and they always get back to you almost immediately. Sometimes you have questions that canâ€™t be answered with a tick in a box.
I trusted Homestay and I did well.
